abstract: Malignant melanomas of the penis and male urethra are uncommon lesions. We report 3 new cases of male urethral melanoma and 1 case of penile melanoma, bringing the total numbers of reported cases to 26 and 57, respectively. The literature is reviewed, and biological, histopathological and therapeutic considerations are analyzed.
title: Malignant melanoma of the penis and male urethra: 4 case reports and literature review.
